Uses of Command in vista.app
 

Methods in vista.app with parameters of type Command
static void Executor.execute(Command com, View view)
          executes the command
 

Constructors in vista.app with parameters of type Command
CommandActionAdapter(Command com, View view, boolean execute, boolean backgroundExecution)
          Exceutes or unexecutes a command depending upon whether execute is true or false
ExecutionRunner(Command com, View view)
          initializes the runner with the command and the affected view

Uses of Command in vista.gui
 

Classes in vista.gui that implement Command
 class MacroCommand
          A macro command is a command which executes a list of commands in a certain order as defined by the order of addition.
 

Methods in vista.gui with parameters of type Command
 void MacroCommand.addCommand(Command c)
          adds command to list
 void MacroCommand.removeCommand(Command c)
          removes command from list
 

Constructors in vista.gui with parameters of type Command
